attributes.action: launch an enquiry into the effectiveness and misuse of the powers given to the police to detain supposed terrorists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
for example, to investigate why an opposition MP was detained under anti-terror laws?? Was the MP supposed to be a terrorist? ...it looks like the police action of a militarist regime not a healthy democracy...
President Obama declared he "rejects as false the choice between our safety and our ideals". It looks like it would be easier for the police authorities here to maintain the ideals of democracy, if they were burdened with fewer powers that were liable to misuse.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
